_source.text: 101st Airborne division veteran recalls WWII: I took no prisoners, I blew away every German soldier I saw Victor Lee Mackool became a sergeant in the motor pool, but later signed up with the 101st Airborne Division because the pay was better by $100 per month.

_source.text: A fighter that can put opponents away with his impressive kick boxing or his relentless jiu-jitsu, the 28-year-old Denver, Colorado native put together a solid resume in the WEC with wins over Chris Horodecki, Jamie Varner, Ed Ratcliff, James Krause, Rob McCullough and Danny Castillo - and with a second-round submission over Paul Kelly in his UFC debut, the lightweight division better take notice because "Cowboy" just rode into town.
